pullrequest.title: Added GUI configuration via INI file

content.raw:
A scroll area would be a long-term solution. By allowing the render window to shrink, we have to have a mechanism to view the hidden items.

The JointControl panel should stay on the right. The left panel is for modifying and introspecting the world. The right panel is for utilities.
